eas_text: A civil authority has issued A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: San Joaquin, CA; at 02:24 AM ON JAN 26, 2026 Effective until 03:24 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: San Joaquin County Sheriff's Office: Missing at Risk Teen. Hispanic Male, 5'4" tall, red hair. Last seen at Turner Rd / Davis Rd wearing Camo sweatshirt and grey sweatpants, green glasses. Contact San Joaquin County Sheriff at 209-468-4400 if you have any information as to his whereabouts.
